text: Ezɨ 7plan dughiaba gɨvazɨma, an borim areme, ezɨ an ingangarir gumaziba an borimɨn ovevemɨn gun an mɨkɨman bar atiatingi. Me kamaghɨn uarira uariv gei, “Borim tɨghar ovengamin dughiamɨn, e a mɨgeima an e barazi puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn e datɨrɨghɨn borimɨn ovevemɨn gun a mɨkemeghan kogham. A bizir kam baregh ti dɨkavigh uabɨ gasɨghasigham.”
